Hello World! I'm Qi Yu.

Software Developer @ GFT Technologies

About Me

I am a software developer at GFT Technologies (since July 2024).
I'm based at GFT Software Solutions in Konstanz, located along the beautiful Rhine River.

Technologies and tools I use most frequently:

Previously, I worked as an academic staff member in natural language processing (NLP) at the University of Konstanz (March 2020 - May 2024), where I developed machine learning and statistical solutions to detect framing strategies in journalistic texts.

I earned my PhD degree in October 2024 - proudly with the highest distinction SUMMA CUM LAUDE!
See the tabs Research Projects and Publications for my research outputs.

When I'm not coding, I love to spend my time on:
Creating fan art / writing fan fiction / watching football / watching My Little Pony.
